content.description: Stand start with a left hand sloper and a faint right hand sidepull crimp at the six foot level and move straight up.
content.location: This is on the 14th Hole Boulder about 2-3 feet right of the problem Addiction. Start standing with your back to the pond.

content.description: Start on a sidepull, the same as Rehab and Freedom from Addiction. Rock up on a high left foot hold, and climb the right side of the slab. This uses the same start and finish as Rehab, just three grades easier.
content.location: It ascends the left arete on the steep side.

content.description: Sit start as for the problem Freedom from Addiction. Make a few moves right, then head straight up to two crimpy sidepulls, lockoff, and crank left to a decent sidepull and topout.
content.location: This is on the 14th Hole Boulder.

content.description: Sit start on a sharp edged rock and climb straight up making a crux highstep.
content.location: This is on the 14th Hole Boulder. Walk around to the backside of the boulder about 4 feet right of the problem The Flake.

content.description: Sit start matched on a good sidepull crimpbar on the side of the block that faces the green. Climb a slowly rising traverse right for several moves, and then get set up to finish straight up on crimps.
content.location: This is on the 14th Hole Boulder out on the golf course.

content.description: Crouch start with the obvious good left hand flake and climb straight up.
content.location: This is on the 14th Hole Boulder. Walk around to the backside of the boulder about 4-5 feet right of the problem Fair Game.

content.description: Sit start and climb cool good holds with excellent movement.
content.location: This is on the 14th Hole Boulder. Walk around back to the backside of the boulder which is not as steep. Start about 2-3 feet right of the problem Ass Dragger Arete.

content.description: Sit start on a rock and bump right to a good set of rounded sidepulls above each other. Then make the crux moves up the sparse slab.
content.location: This is on the 14th Hole Boulder about 2-3 feet right of the problem Baldy.

content.description: Sit start on the ground with a decent left hand on the arete and your right hand on a big,flat hold. Make some great arete slaps and cool moves as you use both aretes to reach the top.
content.location: This is on the 14th Hole Boulder. This is a dead obvious, bearhug type arete.

content.description: Start as for Addiction, then climb left into Rehab, and finish on Rehab.

Sit start really low with your left hand very low on the face and your right hand on a low sidepull on the arete and crank out left (crux) to a very small crimp. Climb straight up the face and arete to top out.
content.location: This is on the 14th Hole Boulder. Climb the arete about 7-8 feet right of the problem Stick to the Script.

content.description: Sit start with a slopey right hand pinch on the arete and a tiny left one finger crimp. Crank up and left to two obvious holds and finish as for the problem Freedom from Addiction.
content.location: This is on the 14th Hole Boulder. Start about 8-9 feet right of the problem Freedom from Addiction.

content.description: This is a single, great golden block right on the 14th hole.
